name: CollectorController
description: CollectorController. The CollectorController contracts allows the owner of the contract to approve or transfer tokens from the collector proxy contract. The admin of the Collector proxy can't be the same as the fundsAdmin address. This is needed due the usage of transparent proxy pattern.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: Transfer an amount of tokens to the recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity to transfer the tokens.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfer an amount of tokens to the recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity to transfer the tokens.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
